name: shallowequal
description: Like lodash isEqualWith but for shallow equal.

scripts.build: npm run build:strip-flow && npm run build:gen-flow
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run pretty && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run test
